Pre-Game Insights: USA is making its first appearance in the T20 World Cup.
Canada is also making its T20 World Cup debut.
Former New Zealand all-rounder Corey Anderson adds experience to the USA squad.
Fast bowler Ali Khan, with his global franchise experience, will lead the bowling attack for USA.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The tournament opener between USA and Canada will take place on June 1.
Fans in the United States and Canada can watch the 2024 T20 World Cup live on WillowTV.
Fubo now includes Willow TV in its sports package.
The final match is set for June 29.
Others: The ICC Men's T20 World Cup is back with its ninth edition in 2024 making it a historic event, taking place for the first time in the United States and the West Indies.
This year's T20 World Cup sees 20 teams competing for the first time in its 17-year history.
This tournament marks cricket's first major global event in the U.S.
